## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cc6ec3d00f5ac0565644d0b1fce06bf68473a14b48df88761451345f12c7475c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'angular-material-panel' @ 1.1.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
